description: Stylesheet for theme management and layout of the App component in a React web application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center alignment and theme-based background color.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with flex layout for centering content.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Logo of the application with animation effects.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styled link element, color transitions based on theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes with hover effects and transition styles.
